original_text: During the night Abram divided his men to attack them and he routed them, pursuing them as far as Hobah, north of Damascus.
korean_text: 그와 그의 가신들이 나뉘어 밤에 그들을 쳐부수고 다메섹 왼편 호바까지 쫓아가

sentences.original_text: Abram divided his men to attack them
sentences.korean_translation: 아브람은 그들을 공격하기 위해 자기 사람들을 나누었고

sentences.original_text: pursuing them as far as Hobah
